Summary: Bright blue long glowing light moving in different directions quickly.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking down 28th Ave towards Cactus to a gas station and noticed a blue light. It remained around the same altitude for over 4 mins but moved left to right fairly quickly (quicker than any airplane I've ever seen) and may have moved up and down a bit too. It was very high and very far away but it almost looked like it would get closer and further away also. I thought I was just seeing things but then I noticed a couple cars were pulled over looking at it also. As I walked by one of the cars, I asked if they were looking at it and it was two girls that saw it, pulled over, and were watching it and they were freaked out. About that time, the light just disappeared and I walked in the gas station. I came back home and looked it up and there are definitely others around me that have seen it in the past.
trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around November 29th 2013
